mdRecord.dcterms:title: Oh Dad, Poor Dad, Mama's Hung You in the Closet and I'm so Sad [by] Arthur L. Kopit
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Production poster for Arthur L Kopit's Oh Dad, Poor Dad, Mama's Hung You in the Closet and I'm so Sad. Actors include Elizabeth Wilson, Jerry Oddo, Jane Cronin, Ian Wilder. Directed by Edwin Wilson. Opening the 32nd season of the Barter Theatre. June 8-20.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
